meanings.definition: To shape (a plastic material) by heating it until soft and then cooling it in a mold.
meanings.sent1: I thermoform the plastic to make it into different shapes.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers thermoform plastic to create various products.
meanings.sent3: The plastic decided to thermoform itself into a new form for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas thermoform into reality when she starts working on them.
meanings.sent5: The heat helped thermoform the plastic into a beautiful sculpture.

meanings.definition: The process of shaping plastic material by heating it until soft and then cooling it in a mold.
meanings.sent1: Thermoform is a common technique used in plastic manufacturing.
meanings.sent2: The thermoform of plastic involves precise temperature control.
meanings.sent3: At the plastic party, everyone discussed the art of thermoform.
meanings.sent4: The thermoform of ideas can lead to innovative product designs.
meanings.sent5: The thermoform of the plastic sheet resulted in a perfect mold.
